custom-meta.meta-value: All relevant data can freely downloaded from database URLs listed both in the references and below, and are cited in the materials and methods section. Soils: National Cooperative Soil Survey. National cooperative soil characterization database. http://ncsslabdatamart.sc.egov.usda.gov/. Weather: National Cooperative Soil Survey. National cooperative soil characterization database. http://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/cdo-web/datasets. Crop Progress Reports: National Agricultural Statistics Service. Illinois crop progress and condition reports. http://www.nass.usda.gov/Statistics_by_State/Illinois/Publications/Crop_Progress_&_Condition/.
